Class MilitaryUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MapObject
      • model.Unit
        • model.MilitaryUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Symbolizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HybridUnit, MeleeUnit, RangedUnit, SiegeUnit

    abstract class MilitaryUnit
extends Unit
    Author: Marios Pafitis 911719 mpafit02 Military Unit is a Unit. Is the superclass for the Hybrid Unit, Melee Unit, BlackPowder Unit, Siege Unit, Legion Unit and Ranged Unit. Getters: getDamage Setters: setDamage Constructors: MilitaryUnit(int health, Civilization owner, int baseEndurance, int pay, int initialGoldCost, int initialFoodCost, int ResourceCost, int damage), MilitaryUnit(int health) Methods: increaseDamage, tick, battle, toString
    Author:
    Marios
